title: Windows 11 is coming to Microsoft Hololens
description: Windows Holographic version 23H1 (aka Windows 11) addresses some user concerns for Hololens devices.

title: WhatsApp beta now lets you send video messages – here's how to enable it
description: Besides the 60-second clips for mobile, WhatsApp is also giving Windows users some quality-of-life changes in a third beta.

title: This dangerous new malware is after your WhatsApp backups
description: Two instant messaging apps are stealing WhatsApp backups, among other sensitive data.

title: Google Domains shuts down, assets sold to Squarespace
description: Sharpening its focus is the aim of the game for Google as it sells its Domains business to Squarespace.

title: Leaked Z Fold 5 renders show it could solve a major foldable phone issue
description: New images show both phones will come with a waterdrop hinge, boosting durability and reducing the screen crease.

title: iPhone 15 specs predictions: everything we expect to see from every model
description: We've collated all the rumored specs for the iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 15 Ultra.

title: Barracuda email cyberattack may have been used by hackers to spy on US government
description: A Barracuda ESG vulnerability was exploited for up to seven months by a group believed to be Chinese-backed spies.

title: The first victims of the MOVEit ransomware attacks have been revealed
description: The number of victims is likely to grow, but we already have some high-profile names on the list.

title: Assassin's Creed Jade release date, platforms, story, and everything we know
description: Assassin's Creed Jade offers a new setting and assassin to discover without straying from the signature charm of the franchise.

description: The Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty release date is this September and will transport us to a brand new side of Night City, with a whole world to discover.

title: iOS 17 is introducing the best new feature that you'll hopefully never use
description: Apple will be introducing a new passcode feature with the iOS 17 update coming later in 2023, and it's both a blessing and a curse.

title: Intel launches new quantum chip that could one day make x86 obsolete
description: Intel is giving researchers a head start with quantum computing with the launch of Tunnel Falls.

title: A CS:GO pro player has died defending Ukraine
description: Family, friends, and fans morn the loss of CS:GO pro player Ostap '0ni' Onistrat who has been killed fighting Russian forces.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Max, Prime Video and more this weekend (June 16)
description: From mind-bending Netflix thrillers to returning action franchises, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: It's finally happening: Canon tipped to open up mirrorless cameras to third-party lenses
description: Canon is rumored to be opening its mirrorless cameras to third parties, with two Sigma lenses tipped for end of 2023

title: Kids are the future with Crusader Kings 3's next event pack, Wards & Wardens
description: Crusader Kings 3's event pack Wards & Wardens, adds a whole lot of life events and narrative happenings for children.

title: Unsure about YouTube Music? A big web redesign makes it much more attractive
description: YouTube Music’s ditching its Home, Explore and Library tabs and adding a collapsible navigation drawer to look more like regular YouTube.

title: The Katana SE gaming soundbar lets you hear your enemies before they see you
description: Sporting a genre-specific audio modes, Creative Technology's new Katana SE can engulf you in realistic sound at a low price.

title: YouTube Music is reportedly coming to Garmin watches with offline playback
description: Leaks suggest that Garmin users might get YouTube Music on their watches, even while offline – just like Spotify.

title: Reddit has a terrible plan to end blackout: ask you to vote out protesting mods
description: Reddit's CEO has a plan to end the ongoing Reddit Blackout protesting its API changes but asking users to vote out mods.

title: It's official: Microsoft says it won't make any more new games for the Xbox One
description: Microsoft has "moved on to Gen 9" and will officially wave goodbye to making new games for the Xbox One.

description: BattleBit Remastered's early access release has taken the Steam charts by storm, offering minimalist military action at a refreshingly low price.

title: Samsung's big-screen TV The Wall could be used in your favorite movies and TV shows
description: Samsung's The Wall for Virtual Production, a modular micro-LED TV, could have a starring role in Hollywood studios.

description: A so-called 'super update' is starting to roll out on Samsung Galaxy S23 phones, bring several camera improvements.

title: New iOS 17 feature will help protect your child’s eyes from long-term harm
description: Screen Distance will alert you when you hold your iPhone too close to your eyes for an extended period of time.

title: Microsoft makes Bing’s AI chatbot easier to talk to in Windows 11
description: Want to chat with Bing AI in a more natural way? Voice input is now supported on desktop PCs.

description: Failures to install are happening (again), plus there are reports of some really troublesome bugs here.

title: The top Nintendo Switch Piracy subreddit has been banned
